BIRMINGHAM , Alabama - A judge has delayed the trial of a man  charged with attempted murder ,  related to a 2012 interstate shootout with Mayor William Bell 's security team , after prosecutors could not find a witness .

BIRMINGHAM , Alabama - A judge has delayed the trial of a man  charged with attempted murder ,  related to a 2012 interstate shootout with Mayor William Bell 's security team , after prosecutors could not find a witness .
On Thursday , however , Deputy Jefferson County District Attorney Carl S. Randall filed a motion asking for the trial to be continued .
On Thursday , however , Deputy Jefferson County District Attorney Carl S. Randall filed a motion asking for the trial to be continued .
Prosecutors have been unable to reach a witness who was riding with Major , but believes the witness can be located with more time , Randall stated in the motion .

Judge Vinson granted Randall 's motion Friday .
She did not set a new date for the trial .
Major is serving time in state prison after his probation was revoked on marijuana possession and robbery charges from 2010 and 2011 .
Major 's attorney , Sheila Ann Weil , has previously noted that Major had two other people , a man and woman , in the car with him .
